Don’t worry if you occasionally

the risks are quite small.
Caffeine	content	of	food	and	
drink
• 1	mug	of	instant	coffee:	 
 100mg
• 1	mug	of	filter	coffee:	 
 140mg
• 1 mug of tea: 75mg
• 1 can of cola: 40mg
• 1 can of ‘energy’ drink:  
 up to 80mg
• 1 50g bar of plain  
 chocolate: up to 50mg
